channel.title: 317 how to add spawn commands, for mods, and normal players
channel.description: how to add spawning for normal players.... but not every item... and how

item.title: 317 how to add spawn commands, for mods, and normal players
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

easy move your command to under a command players can use. to stop ppl spawning certain items

int restrictedItems[] = { 11694, 4151 }; //item id for items you don't want spawnable for (int i : restrictedItems) { if (i == newItemID) { if (c.playerRights != 2) { //does not apply for admins c.sendMessage("You can't spawn this item!"); return; } } }

Read full topic
